amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase assistance to Afghanistan by $247 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to shift funds from the Iraq Relief and Reconstruction Fund to rebuilding and asistance eforts in Afghanistan.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A016) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A016) offered by Mr. Blumenauer.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Blumenauer amendment (A016) Failed by voice vote.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
